mapper.insert: insert into bb_occasion_attendee (acknowledged, attendeeSource, attendingStatus, bbxUserGuid, bbxUsername, created, email, modified, password, version, guid) values (#{acknowledged,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{attendeeSource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attendingStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bbxUserGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bbxUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=DATE}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modified,jdbcType=DATE}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update bb_occasion_attendee set acknowledged = #{acknowledged,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, attendeeSource = #{attendeeSource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, attendingStatus = #{attendingStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bbxUserGuid = #{bbxUserGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bbxUsername = #{bbxUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modified = #{modified,jdbcType=DATE}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where guid = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from bb_occasion_attendee where guid in (select attendees_guid from bb_occasion_bb_occasion_attendee where occasions_guid = #{value})
mapper.select: select a.* from bb_occasion_attendee a, bb_occasion_bb_occasion_attendee ooa where a.guid = ooa.attendees_guid and ooa.occasions_guid = #{value}
